synopsis.text: Viola, a human baby with an uncanny magical aura, is discovered by Alyssa, a solitary witch dwelling in the heart of the forest. Despite initial hesitation, Alyssa takes the child under her wing, naming her Viola and raising her as her own. As the years pass, Viola blossoms into a talented and striking young woman, but her towering stature and naive nature often lead to humorous misunderstandings about their true roles as parent and child. Join this enchanting duo as they navigate their unconventional life filled with magical mishaps and heartwarming moments.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
